title: Never give up
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social interaction in youth
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social interaction in youth
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Conduct of life
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Spine - Wounds and Injuries
abstract: As a little kid, I was bigger than the others. My older brother used to pick on me. By the age of 11, I couldn't take it no more.
description: Haris Fazlic got sick of being larger than his classmates and took up exercising and, eventually, discovered his passion for wrestling. This passion has driven him to win many times despite having to overcome a major obstacle on the way. Wrestling has taught Haris that you should never give up on something you love, no matter what.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001927; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; To be Catalogued; 2009
